content: Nov 7 Exelon Corp's ExGen Texas Power LLC unit on Tuesday filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection after struggling to cope with massive swings in energy prices.

content: June 2 Exelon Corp  the biggest U.S. nuclear power plant operator  said on Thursday it will shut reactors at the Clinton and Quad Cities nuclear stations in Illinois  given a lack of progress on state energy legislation that would have allowed the plants to operate economically.

content: Pepco Holdings Inc  which is awaiting regulatory approval from Washington DC for its acquisition by Exelon Corp  said the two utilities have not extended the deadline to close the deal  but were in talks with state authorities.
name: Exelon Corporation
title: Pepco  Exelon maintain deal closing deadline amid regulatory scrutiny

content: WASHINGTON  March 1 Washington Mayor Muriel Bowser and the city's Office of the People's Counsel both said that they would oppose changes that the city's Public Service Commission made to a pact that would allow Exelon Corp's  deal to buy Pepco Holdings Inc  dealing a tough blow to the gigantic deal.
name: Exelon Corporation
title: Washington's mayor  counsel  reject revision of Exelon deal for Pepco

content: WASHINGTON  Feb 26 The D.C. Public Service Commission voted on Friday to make revisions to an offer that Exelon Corp made in order to win approval for its merger with Pepco Holdings Inc  after first rejecting the companies' improved offer.
name: Exelon Corporation
title: UPDATE 2-D.C. commission offers deal to save Exelon's plan to buy Pepco

content: WASHINGTON  Feb 26 The D.C. Public Service Commission voted to revise an offer that Exelon Corp  made in order to win approval for its merger with Pepco Holdings Inc  after first rejecting the companies' improved offer.

title: DC public service commission rejects Exelon deal for Pepco  offers revised settlement

title: D.C. Public Service Commission to mull revised Exelon deal for Pepco

title: UPDATE 1-GSA asks regulators to reject Pepco-Exelon deal-Washington Post

content: Exelon Corp plans to press forward with its $6.8 billion purchase of Pepco Holdings Inc  which would create the nation's top power distributor  despite opposition from Washington  D.C.'s utilities regulator.
name: Exelon Corporation
title: Exelon  Pepco say they will press forward with merger

content: WASHINGTON Utilities regulators for the District of Columbia on Tuesday denied Exelon Corp’s  $6.8 billion bid for Pepco Holdings Inc   dealing a major blow to a deal that would have created the country's top power distributor.
name: Exelon Corporation
title: Washington D.C. regulators reject Exelon-Pepco power merger

name: Exelon Corporation
title: New power rules may preserve Exelon nuclear plants in Illinois

content: May 18 Exelon Corp said on Monday it would agree to conditions placed last week by the state of Maryland on the power company's $6.8 billion bid for Pepco Holdings Inc  clearing one of the deal's last hurdles.
name: Exelon Corporation
title: Exelon  Pepco agree to Maryland's merger conditions

content: April 5 Exelon Corp said on Sunday that a small electrical fire was extinguished in the reactor building at its 2 264-megawatt Limerick nuclear power plant in Pennsylvania.
name: Exelon Corporation
title: Small fire put out at Exelon's Pennsylvania nuclear power plant

content: Exelon Corp is looking to wrap up the last challenges to its $6.8 billion purchase of Pepco Holding Inc to create the biggest U.S. power generator  but faces vocal criticism from environmentalists.
name: Exelon Corporation
title: Exelon looks to wrap up Pepco merger  environmentalists resist

content: Feb 27 Exelon Corp said on Friday that its 1 146-megawatt Unit 1 at the Limerick nuclear power plant in Pennsylvania returned to full power today after repair of a valve on one of the unit's main steam lines.
name: Exelon Corporation
title: Exelon returns Limerick Unit 1 to full power
